projects.title: Real-time chatapp
projects.bodyText:
- This is user-friendly chat app
 -  Users can send and receive messages instantly.
 - Secure login and registration system.
 -Ability to create and join group chats.
 - Optimized for both desktop and mobile users.
 - This project is a full-stack web application built using the MERN stack, which stands for MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.

projects.title: E-commerce shopping app
projects.bodyText:
- This is user-friendly shopping app.
 - Secure login/signup with potential roles like admin or customer.
 - Displaying products with details like images, prices, and descriptions.
 - Users can add, remove, or update items in their cart.
 - Handling orders, payments, and confirmations.
 - Optimized for desktop and mobile devices.
 - This project is a full-stack web application built using the MERN stack, which stands for MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.

projects.title: Twitter clone app
projects.bodyText:
- This is Twitter clone app.
 - Secure login/signup with potential accounts.
 - Media Support: Upload and display images or videos in posts.
 - Real-time private chat between users.
 - Handling orders, payments, and confirmations.
 - Users can update profile pictures, bios, and other details.
 - Optimized for desktop and mobile devices.
 - This project is a full-stack web application built using the MERN stack, which stands for MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.

projects.title: Password-Reset
projects.bodyText:
- The project focuses on providing a secure and user-friendly system for managing user accounts and passwords.
 - Security measures implemented for storing passwords (hashing, salting) in the database.
 - A secure and straightforward process for users to reset their passwords.
 - User-friendly interface for signup and login functionalities.
 - Utilization of Node Mailer for sending password reset emails securely.

projects.title: Shopping cart
projects.bodyText:
- This project is about creating a shopping cart with given JSON data using React.
 - This is an Cart Items List website which is based on react useContext Hook using React.
 - Cart functionality: add and remove products, adjust quantities.

projects.title: Library Management
projects.bodyText:
- This Project is about creating a Library Management Sytem using React Formik.
 - A web application designed to help manage your library's books and authors.
 - Add and manage books, including titles, authors, ISBN numbers, and publication dates.
 - Add and manage authors with their names, birthdates, and biographies.

projects.title: CRUD App
projects.bodyText:
- A simple CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application built using React and Axios. This project demonstrates how to perform basic CRUD operations on user data.
 -  This project demonstrates how to perform basic CRUD operations on user data.

projects.title: GUVI blog App
projects.bodyText:
- Guvi blog app includes details of courses.
 - the navigation for courses in the middle of the page like All , full stack development, Data science , Cyber Security & Career As Navigation menu.
 -  using react router dom and add the contents as static as given in pages

projects.title: Price Card
projects.bodyText:
- A simple price card web app made with **React**.
 -  this user interface using a React.js application with **JSX**

projects.title: File system
projects.bodyText: - This project content consists of the current timestamp, and its filename reflects the current date and time.

projects.title: Paddy leaf disease detection
projects.bodyText: - Developed a Machine learning application to assist farmers in early disease diagnosis, promoting efficient crop management with a focus on data privacy and ethics.
